original_text: Jesus was in the wilderness for 40 days. During this time, Satan tried to cause him to do wrong things. There were wild animals with Jesus in the wilderness. God's angels took care of him.
korean_text: 광야에서 사십 일을 계시면서 사탄에게 시험을 받으시며 들짐승과 함께 계시니 천사들이 수종들더라

sentences.original_text: Satan tried to cause him to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 사탄은 그가 잘못된 일을 하도록 유혹했습니다

sentences.original_text: There were wild animals with Jesus
God's angels took care of him
